name: Visor & Surfaces
description: tfjs-vis provides some UI helpers to make it easier to render

name: Models & Tensors
description: This library exposes a show namespace that provides a number of higher level functions
useful for rendering tfjs concepts. They lean towards being opinionated rather than flexible
but are generally combinations of Renderers (see below), so one can easily roll their own.

subheadings.name: Model Inspection
description: These functions are useful for examing models, layers and tensors

subheadings.name: Model Training
description: These functions are useful for monitoring training.

subheadings.name: Model Evaluation
description: These functions are useful for evaluating the quality of a model.

name: Charts
description: The library exposes a render namespace that provides a number of functions that plot
particular visualizations. Most of these functions take regular JavaScript objects

name: Metrics
description: The metrics namespace contains a few utility functions for computing
quality metrics like accuracy or creating confusion matrices.
